item.description:
Sol LeWitt Tour & Film, March 17

Thursday, March 17, 5:30 pm

Join Andrea Miller-Keller for a tour of LeWitt Wall Drawings, followed by a screening of Sol LeWitt: Wall Drawings with a special introduction by the film's director, Ed Howard. The film will also be shown Saturday, March 19 at 7:30 pm & Sunday, March 20 at 2 pm.

Admission includes the tour and movie. Adult- $9, Seniors (62+) -$8, Students- $8, Members- $7, Film Buffs- $3.50, Film Stars- Free.

 

NOTE:  I have conflicts on both Saturday and Sunday, so I hope to get there on Thursday.  However, if another day is better for you, please go to see this.  It should be an interesting movie even if you don't get the art tour.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Sol LeWitt Tour & Film @ Wadsworth Atheneum
